Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

11  KSComponent()

14  KSTrajTermDrift* KSTrajTermDrift::Clone() const
15  {
16  return new KSTrajTermDrift( *this );

18  KSTrajTermDrift::~KSTrajTermDrift()
19  {
20  }
21 
22  void KSTrajTermDrift::Differentiate(double /*aTime*/, const KSTrajAdiabaticParticle& aParticle, KSTrajAdiabaticDerivative& aDerivative ) const
23  {
24  KThreeVector tMagneticField = aParticle.GetMagneticField();
25  KThreeVector tMagneticFieldUnit = tMagneticField.Unit();
26  KThreeMatrix tMagneticGradient = aParticle.GetMagneticGradient();
27  KThreeVector tMagneticGradientUnit;
28  tMagneticGradientUnit.X() = tMagneticFieldUnit.X() * tMagneticGradient( 0, 0 ) + tMagneticFieldUnit.Y() * tMagneticGradient( 0, 1 ) + tMagneticFieldUnit.Z() * tMagneticGradient( 0, 2 );
29  tMagneticGradientUnit.Y() = tMagneticFieldUnit.X() * tMagneticGradient( 1, 0 ) + tMagneticFieldUnit.Y() * tMagneticGradient( 1, 1 ) + tMagneticFieldUnit.Z() * tMagneticGradient( 1, 2 );
30  tMagneticGradientUnit.Z() = tMagneticFieldUnit.X() * tMagneticGradient( 2, 0 ) + tMagneticFieldUnit.Y() * tMagneticGradient( 2, 1 ) + tMagneticFieldUnit.Z() * tMagneticGradient( 2, 2 );
31 
32  KThreeVector tElectricField = aParticle.GetElectricField();
33  double tMagneticFieldMag = tMagneticField.Magnitude();
34  double tMagneticFieldMag2 = tMagneticField.MagnitudeSquared();
35  double tMagneticFieldMag3 = tMagneticFieldMag2 * tMagneticFieldMag;
36  double tLongMomentum = aParticle.GetLongMomentum();
37  double tLongMomentum2 = tLongMomentum * tLongMomentum;
38  double tLorentzFactor = aParticle.GetLorentzFactor();
39  double tTransMomentum = aParticle.GetTransMomentum();
40  double tTransMomentum2 = tTransMomentum * tTransMomentum;
41  double tMass = aParticle.GetMass();
42  double tCharge = aParticle.GetCharge();
43 
44  KThreeVector tDriftVelocity = (1. / tMagneticFieldMag2) * tElectricField.Cross( tMagneticField ) + ((2. * tLongMomentum2 + tTransMomentum2) / (tCharge * tMagneticFieldMag3 * tMass * (1. + tLorentzFactor))) * (tMagneticField.Cross( tMagneticGradientUnit ));
45  double tLongitudinalForce = ((-1. * tTransMomentum2) / (2. * tMagneticFieldMag * tLongMomentum)) * tMagneticFieldUnit.Dot( tMagneticGradient * tDriftVelocity ) + ((tCharge * tLorentzFactor * tMass) / (tLongMomentum)) * tElectricField.Dot( tDriftVelocity );
46  double tTransverseForce = ((tTransMomentum)/(2. * tMagneticFieldMag)) * tMagneticFieldUnit.Dot( tMagneticGradient * tDriftVelocity );
47 
48  trajmsg_debug( "adiabatic drift gc velocity: <" << tDriftVelocity << ">" << ret )
49  trajmsg_debug( "adiabatic drift longitudinal force <" << tLongitudinalForce << ">" << ret )
50  trajmsg_debug( "adiabatic drift transverse force <" << tTransverseForce << ">" << ret )
51 
52  aDerivative.AddToGuidingCenterVelocity( tDriftVelocity );
53  aDerivative.AddToLongitudinalForce( tLongitudinalForce );
54  aDerivative.AddToTransverseForce( tTransverseForce );
55 
56  return;
57  }
58 
59 }
